Title: The Shanghai workers support the construction of the whole nation
Publisher: Huadong renmin meishu chubanshe (华东人民美术出版社), Shanghai
Notes: A 10-poster set published in Shanghai in 1953. Shanghai workers in steelworks, heavy industry, and other examples of advanced work pledge to give their utmost to develop the nation and the economy. Various industrial scenes. Model worker Zhu Wenjuan (朱文娟).
